platformer.BasicSprite

Class QMCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BasicShapes.Box
      • platformer.MovingShapes.MBox
        • platformer.ExtendedShapes.MControls
          • platformer.BasicSprite.MCharacter

  • public class QMCharacter
extends QMControls
    This object actually has image that can be display, and or a color. The choice is completely yours. It does not have Bounding Box, only a box.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QMCharacter()
      Constructor for the character, originally contains no image, and color is set to black.

      Returns this character's image.

      Sets the color of the character to whatever you want.
